text: Schedule of Sanctions for Violators of Traffic Rules FSER-C94001-01 Vehicular Traffic Control Procedure within the Campus Area (SER-C940-04) Article 5.2. 100 points are allocated to each driver registered to PTS. For each rule violation, points are deducted according to the penalty table. In case of repeated violation, double the score shown in the table is deducted. PTS registration of drivers who lose all their points is canceled and if necessary, they are referred to the Disciplinary Investigation Board. Penalty records are kept by the Security Directorate and cancellation of vehicle stickers is carried out by the Security Directorate.
